title: Google\Cloud\Monitoring\V3\WindowsBasedSli
name: WindowsBasedSli
description:
A WindowsBasedSli defines good_service as the count of time windows for which the provided service was of good quality. Criteria for determining if service was good are embedded in the window_criterion.

Generated from protobuf message google.monitoring.v3.WindowsBasedSli

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.good_bad_metric_filter
params.description: A monitoring filter specifying a TimeSeries with ValueType = BOOL. The window is good if any true values appear in the window.

params.name: data.good_total_ratio_threshold
params.description: A window is good if its performance is high enough.

params.name: data.metric_mean_in_range
params.description: A window is good if the metric's value is in a good range, averaged across returned streams.

params.name: data.metric_sum_in_range
params.description: A window is good if the metric's value is in a good range, summed across returned streams.

params.name: data.window_period
params.description: Duration over which window quality is evaluated. Must be an integer fraction of a day and at least 60s.
